channel.title: Need real help PL0X
channel.description:
Ok well since no one helped me on the other post. Propperly becuase i didnt explain what i needed help on. So this time i am not going to type word by word what i need help on, today i will be posting it on ..... [center][b]PICTURES[/b][/center] I need a TUT on how to make a 317 client spacificly with these sprite's/animations added to it with "Dragon Claws" and such "Dark Cape" If anyone could help that would be great here's the pictures
[IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/9-03-200910-07-42pm.png[/img] [b]and[/b] [IMG]http://i438.photobucket.com/albums/qq110/Mason_013/3171.png[/img]
[s]Omg that was not 1[/s] [b]But double the amount of pictures basicly for free!![/b] [tt]lol[/tt]

item.title: Need real help PL0X
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Why don’t you do it yourself? Its not exactly hard and you will learn something for once instead of relying on other people…

Tut - For cusom items ‘search’

And to add or change sprites maybe download GIMP or use Paint or just re-colour them or use whatever program you want.

Read full topic
